name: Oure
description: Take flight in a dream-like cloudscape as you seek to reawaken the relics of a lost civilisation. As a unique child born with the powers of the ancient dragons, your parents cast you from the stricken surface into the land above the skies.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64-bit or newer Processor: Dual Core 2.8Ghz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX650/Radeon 7770 (integrated graphics not supported) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 8 GB available space Additional Notes: Joypad recommended
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64-bit or newer Processor: Quad Core 3.0Ghz Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: GTX960/Radeon R9 290 (integrated graphics not supported) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 8 GB available space Additional Notes: Joypad recommended
